overview.title: Mech Mayhem
overview.excerpt: Join us for Mech Mayhem, an exciting robotics and engineering challenge where participants test their mechanical creations in a fun and competitive environment.

details.title: Mech Mayhem
details.longDescription: Mech Mayhem is a hands-on event where participants bring their mechanical and robotics projects to compete in a series of fun challenges. This is a great opportunity to showcase engineering skills, test innovative ideas, and engage with fellow students in a friendly, competitive atmosphere.
